cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)
mng: fleabane (family Asteraceae), disheveled, classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff

luxuriant, abundant, (onom.) booming sound of wind
